The video was shared on Facebook on Febr: 2020, showing a group of men attacking a bus driver with sticks before attempting to enter the vehicle.
The misleading post: s caption translated to English as "The 15 crores playing their role just before killing a Delhi police constable," referring to Muslims in India.
The video actually depicts a road rage i: a town in Aurangabad district in the Indian state of Maharashtra, not in Delhi.
Multiple sources: including local media and police records, confirm the incident in Kannad, with a case registered against 12 people over the alleged assault on a bus driver and conductor on February 18, 2020.
